channel.title: Combat system 2.0 what do you think?
channel.description:
Combat Version 2.0
Will replace these skills: Mining, Smithing, Fishing, Cooking, WoodCutting, FireMaking, Fishing, Agility,Crafting, and Fletching.
Will add these skills: (TrainBronze, TrainIron, TrainSteel, TrainBlack, TrainMith, TrainAddy, TrainRune, TrainDragon, TrainBarrows, and TrainExotic
a somewhat short explanation of the new skills.
If you weild a Bronze LongSword, and wear Rune PlateLegs, you will get TrainBronze xp, and TrainRunexp, it will be like sub-attack skills. The main attack and defence will be disabled. You first must wear bronze armor/weapons you need a lv of 3 TrainBronze to wear iron.
You must then wear Wear Iron armor / weapons to get TrainIron xp. You need 5 TrainIron to wear steel.
If you understand that, cool :)
Now then, the way the new combat system works is that you could pwn with any set of armor/weapons .. depending on the level of that specific character. here is my best example.
Username - 1337n00b TrainIron Level - 85 TrainRune Level - 16
k :)
With an Iron Scimitar he would hit maybe .. i dunno 21-27 depending on Str level (str level only gives 50% of your maxhit, the rest comes form your Train* level) and then with a Rune Scimitar he'd hit .. 4-7 .. I hope this explains this good enough.
I have this about 55% finished .. if anyone would like to get in on it, PM me, everyone who helps will get full credits.
There is much much more to this, i'm just to 'lazy' to type that much more right now LOL
so lemme know what you think about this, if it's wanted i'll release publicly, if not i'll just use it on another server
P.S. this means the gameplay for this variant will focus more on melee combat, i havent thought of anything for mage / range along with htis yet

item.title: Combat system 2.0 what do you think?
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Good, but instead of bronze, iron, mith, etc., it should be with weapons.

Halberd Skill, sword skill, staff skill, bow skill, spear skill…

Read full topic

item.title: Combat system 2.0 what do you think?
item.dc:creator: @juggalofamilyinc juggalofamilyinc
item.description:
@juggalofamilyinc wrote:

hahaha

uhh i knew that was gunna happen -_-’

it’s complicated … i cba to explain anymore tho … ummm …

basically it expands the melee system so that each armor has it’s different governing skills, so that each armor type has gives dif effects… as stated above

TrainIron Level - 85 With an Iron Scimitar he would hit maybe .. i dunno 21-27 depending on Str level (str level only gives 50% of your maxhit, the rest comes form your Train* level)
TrainRune Level - 16 with a Rune Scimitar he'd hit .. 4-7 depending on Str level (str level only gives 50% of your maxhit, the rest comes form your Train* level)

Read full topic
